mapper.select: select id, uid, invitation_way, enterprise_id, franchisee_id, tenant_id, renewal_status, inviter_id, create_time, update_time, remark from t_enterprise_channel_user where id = #{id}
select id, uid, invitation_way, enterprise_id, franchisee_id, tenant_id, renewal_status, inviter_id, create_time, update_time, remark from t_enterprise_channel_user limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.update:
update t_enterprise_channel_user
uid = #{uid},
invitation_way = #{invitationWay},
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId},
franchisee_id = #{franchiseeId},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
renewal_status = #{renewalStatus},

remark = #{remark},
where id = #{id}
